comment.author: 64339620@N07
comment._content: On the front row from left to right seated are Walter Waldbruer, Claudine Iddings (Mrs. Paul), seated on the floor is Paul Iddings, then Jane Batty (wife of Wayne) and standing with his foot on the chair is deVeaux Riddick. Back row from left to right is Mallory Freeman, next one is unknown, then Bill Lockey.
